text:
Awesome! Hey man, nice to meet you!

So I'm currently in my final year at uni and really going into VFX creature anim. I've done a bit of work at Freefolk in London (literally round the corner from Cinesite).

I'm actually going to take a break from working in a studio when I graduate at first, but still going to be animating away on personal stuff, any uni projects that are looking promising after I graduate, and definitely looking at an animation mentor class or two as well.

Currently just finished my switch to working from home on my final year university project, animating an alien creature!! It's a real challenge for sure. I'm gonna throw some bits together for you to look at and would be awesome if you could spare a couple bits of feedback in your free time. It'll probably be on Syncsketch because it's the friendliest thing I've found so far for reviewing stuff.

Thanks so much for offering to be a mentor!! Amazing to get an extra pair of eyes looking at my work especially from someone this experienced. Can't wait!
hey Amy, I took a snoop at your reel. Great stuff :slightly_smiling_face:
i too have just swtched to remote work
im free to give you feedback when ever
we can use zoom to liek web confrence it too if you like .
